customKernelsCategoryName.title: Define the new name for Kernels Section
customKernelsCategoryName.description: Make sure 'Kernels' is defined within categories property. Kernels section includes all the kernels as a default, just replacing the kernel section name.

maxUsageAge.title: Maximal age of the most recent use of a card (in days)
maxUsageAge.description: If the latest use of a card is higher than maxUsageAge, the card will be considered as never used before.

nRecentCards.title: Number of recent cards to display

persistentMostUsedSection.title: To keep Most Used section in Launcher
